content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

Are you a shop owner of a clothing line along Station Street in Sandringham? Or maybe a business owner of the gourmet food business near the Sandringham beach? If you are, and scaling up your business has crossed your mind, Confetti Design offers affordable web design services that will surely take your business to the next level. We have more than five years of experience under our belt catering to different small businesses like yours, and we’re always ready to help!

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Sandringham

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563925472052{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

From designing your Sandringham ecommerce website to developing a brand that sells, we have all your web design service needs to help you succeed in your business in Sandringham.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563672626485{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Why should you hire Confetti Design for your business in Sandringham

[vc_column_text]

It is fulfilling to call yourself a successful business owner—having your own business and being your own boss. You also operate based on your own standards since you oversee the entire process of your business from start to end. But for your business to step up, you will need to establish strong online presence—in short, a website. Confetti Design specialises in small business web design in Melbourne and Sandringham that achieves your goal of broadening your client base (and your sales!).

The competition among business owners is becoming stiff in this digital world. Confetti Design gives you the competitive advantage of having a website that tailor-fit your Sandringham business and customers, bringing more clients to your doorstep (or email!). Contact us today and start your website with our professional web design services!

Here are the reasons why you should partner with Confetti Design’s professional website development expertise for your business in Sandringham.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604136910{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564468028569{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

We help get your message across

More than just creating a website for you, Confetti Design helps get your message to the audience you’re targeting. Our Clarity Process helps us know your business more. The components of your website will be made according to the results of the Clarity Process to create a good website design that both you and your Sandringham customers will love.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604143056{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564468104572{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

It’s cost effective

We know how busy you are, but we also know how much you’ll love to expand your business not just in Sandringham but globally! Confetti Design takes care of creating your magnificent website that will serve as a 24/7 marketing tool for your business. Our team of expert web developers combined with our unparalleled experience in partnering with small businesses in Melbourne give you the confidence that the website you’re visualising is turned into reality. Our affordable web design service is a small investment that will work for you for the rest of your business’s existence!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604148917{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564468201237{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

You get more time focusing on your business

It is time consuming to create your own website, specially if you have little to no knowledge on doing so. From getting your domain name and hosting, to designing your website, it will take a lot of time and effort from your end. Confetti Design’s services allow you to use that time to focus on your business and clients. All we need from you is a meeting from time to time to show the progress of your Sandringham website, gather your thoughts, and work with our collaborative ideas to finish the best website design for your business.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563672634345{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563672955784{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564542253875{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Sandringham, Mentone, Cheltenham, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are small business web design testimonials from clients in Sandringham and surrounding Bayside suburbs.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563673835832{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
